00019 public class FlagPool implements CheckListViewable
00020 {
00021         private AbstractOrmEntity sourceEntityDefinition;
00022         private String sourceKeyName;
00023         private String sourceKeyValue;

00048         public FlagPool(AbstractOrmEntity sourceEntityDefinition,
00049                         String visibleDescription,
00050                         AbstractOrmEntity intermediateEntityDefinition,
00051                         String intermediateKeyIn, String intermediateKeyOut,
00052                         AbstractOrmEntity foreignEntityDefinition, String foreignKey,
00053                         Vector<String> foreignDescriptionUiControls)
00054         {
00055                 if (sourceEntityDefinition == null || foreignEntityDefinition == null)
00056                         throw new RuntimeException(
00057                                         "Source entity and target entity can't be null");
00058 
00059                 this.sourceEntityDefinition = sourceEntityDefinition;
00060                 this.visibleDescription = visibleDescription;
00061                 this.intermediateEntityDefinition = intermediateEntityDefinition;
00062                 this.intermediateKeyIn = intermediateKeyIn;
00063                 this.intermediateKeyOut = intermediateKeyOut;
00064                 this.foreignEntityDefinition = foreignEntityDefinition;
00065                 this.foreignKey = foreignKey;
00066                 this.foreignDescriptionUiControls = foreignDescriptionUiControls;
00067         }

00069         @Override
00070         public String getVisibleDescription()
00071         {
00072                 return visibleDescription;
00073         }

00075         @Override
00076         public TreeMap<String, String> getAvailableElementList()
00077         {
00078                 // todo: correct deprecate
00079                 Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> entityList = Orm.select(
00080                                 foreignEntityDefinition, null);
00081 
00082                 TreeMap<String, String> availableElementList = new TreeMap<String, String>();
00083 
00084                 String description;
00085                 for (AbstractOrmEntity entity : entityList)
00086                 {
00087                         description = getForeignDescription(entity);
00088 
00089                         while (availableElementList.containsKey(description))
00090                                 description += "_bis";
00091 
00092                         availableElementList.put(
00093                                         description,
00094                                         intermediateEntityDefinition.getSystemName() + "."
00095                                                         + intermediateKeyOut + "."
00096                                                         + entity.getDataString(foreignKey));
00097                 }
00098 
00099                 return availableElementList;
00100         }
00101 
00102         private String getForeignDescription(AbstractOrmEntity entity)
00103 
00104         {
00105                 String description = "";
00106                 String currentValue;
00107                 for (String key : foreignDescriptionUiControls)
00108                 {
00109                         currentValue = entity.getDataString(key);
00110 
00111                         if (currentValue == null)
00112                                 currentValue = "null";
00113 
00114                         if (!currentValue.equals("null") || description.equals(""))
00115                         {
00116                                 ListOfValue listOfValue = entity.tryMatchListOfValue(key);
00117 
00118                                 if (listOfValue != null)
00119                                         description += listOfValue.getElements().get(currentValue);
00120                                 else
00121                                         description += currentValue;
00122 
00123                                 description += " ";
00124                         }
00125                         else
00126                                 description += " - ";
00127                 }
00128                 return description.trim();
00129         }
00130 
00131         @Override
00132         public HashSet<String> getCheckedElementList()
00133 
00134         {
00135                 HashSet<String> checkedElementList = new HashSet<String>();
00136 
00137                 for (AbstractOrmEntity entity : getPositivePluralIntermediateAccessor())
00138                         checkedElementList.add(intermediateEntityDefinition.getSystemName()
00139                                         + "." + intermediateKeyOut + "."
00140                                         + entity.getDataString(intermediateKeyOut));
00141 
00142                 return checkedElementList;
00143         }

00207         public Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> getPositivePluralIntermediateAccessor()
00208 
00209         {
00210                 // searchCriteriaEntity can be null
00211 
00212                 if (sourceKeyName == null || sourceKeyValue == null)
00213                         throw new RuntimeException(
00214                                         "Vous devez préablablement faire une query(clef, valeur) avant d'intéroger les éléments du flag pool");
00215 
00216                 try
00217                 {
00218                         intermediateEntityDefinition.setData(intermediateKeyIn,
00219                                         sourceKeyValue);
00220                 } catch (FieldNotCompatibleException e)
00221                 {
00222                         int sourceKeyValueNumber = Integer.parseInt(sourceKeyValue);
00223                         intermediateEntityDefinition.setData(intermediateKeyIn,
00224                                         sourceKeyValueNumber);
00225                 }
00226 
00227                 Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> pluralAccessor = Orm
00228                                 .select(intermediateEntityDefinition);
00229 
00230                 return pluralAccessor;
00231         }
00232 
00237         public PluralAccessor getPositivePluralForeignAccessor(
00238                         AbstractOrmEntity searchCriteriaEntity)
00239         {
00240                 // searchCriteriaEntity can be null
00241 
00242                 PluralAccessor pluralForeignAccessor = new PluralAccessor(
00243                                 foreignEntityDefinition);
00244 
00245                 Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> resultSet;
00246 
00247                 if (searchCriteriaEntity == null)
00248                 {
00249                         Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> pluralIntermediateAccessor = getPositivePluralIntermediateAccessor();
00250                         for (AbstractOrmEntity intermediateEntity : pluralIntermediateAccessor)
00251                         {
00252                                 foreignEntityDefinition.setData(foreignKey,
00253                                                 intermediateEntity.getData(intermediateKeyOut));
00254 
00255                                 resultSet = Orm.select(foreignEntityDefinition);
00256 
00257                                 for (AbstractOrmEntity result : resultSet)
00258                                 {
00259                                         pluralForeignAccessor.add(result);
00260                                 }
00261                         }
00262                 }
00263                 else
00264                 {
00265                         resultSet = Orm.select(searchCriteriaEntity);
00266 
00267                         AbstractOrmEntity criteredIntermediateEntityDefinition;
00268                         try
00269                         {
00270                                 criteredIntermediateEntityDefinition = intermediateEntityDefinition
00271                                                 .getClass().newInstance();
00272                         } catch (InstantiationException e)
00273                         {
00274                                 throw new RuntimeException(e);
00275                         } catch (IllegalAccessException e)
00276                         {
00277                                 throw new RuntimeException(e);
00278                         }
00279                         criteredIntermediateEntityDefinition.initFields();
00280 
00281                         for (AbstractOrmEntity result : resultSet)
00282                         {
00283                                 Vector<AbstractOrmEntity> intermediateResultSet;
00284 
00285                                 criteredIntermediateEntityDefinition.setData(
00286                                                 intermediateKeyOut, result.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00287                                 criteredIntermediateEntityDefinition.setData(intermediateKeyIn,
00288                                                 sourceEntityDefinition.getPrimaryKeyValue());
00289 
00290                                 intermediateResultSet = Orm
00291                                                 .select(criteredIntermediateEntityDefinition);
00292 
00293                                 if (intermediateResultSet.size() > 0)
00294                                         pluralForeignAccessor.add(result);
00295                         }
00296                 }
00297 
00298                 return pluralForeignAccessor;
00299         }
